itunes:title: We can do hard things! Season 3 Premiere
title: We can do hard things! Season 3 Premiere
description:
We've launched a podcast in Season 1, we trained ourselves to think, "better, not more" in Season 2 and now it's time to learn to do hard things!  Because we can!  Homemakers do hard things every day and we should always be proud of that!

CUE THE WINE MUSIC and GET A BOTTLE FOR A PENNY!  https://www.dryfarmwines.com/pages/pennybottlelp?rfsn=2479198.660dce
Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines. We love them because their wine is delicious - it challenges and explores your wine palette in all the right ways - and their wine makes you feel good!

Today’s episode is brought to you by:
Jovial Foods. Jovial Foods is a company that supplies us homemakers with the most gorgeous baking flours and foods. Jovial is most well known for their einkorn flour, which is a high-protein, weak gluten flour that bakes up buttery and rich.  Visit them at jovialfoods.com and enjoy their free shipping!

Toups & Co is your one-stop-shop for all-natural and organic skincare and makeup! Visit their site at toupsandco.com to enjoy their line of serums, soaps, lotions, shampoo bars, mineral makeup, lipstick, and more! Use code HOMEMAKER for a discount!

Stay in touch on Youtube and Instagram!
@homemakerchicpodcast
@angelaparisiennefarmgirl
@theelliotthomestead
Parisienne Farmgirl: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4P9zhII6woD8WriaQwk6bw?view_as=subscriber
The Elliott Homestead: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgUsMN5zOxCIU1L6MFNnh6w
